title: Orient Experience II
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small restaurant with a broad selection of vegetarian and vegan dishes from various countries of the Middle East, like falafel, hummus, and a few rice dishes. Food is displayed buffet style for take out or inside dining.
